algorithm_technique: dynamic programming to find minimum largest element
problem_summary_simple: Replace 0s with even and 1s with odd numbers in two arrays to make them increasing, minimizing the max number used.
problem_summary_technical: DP state tracks minimum largest number to form increasing arrays up to current elements.
key_insights: the problem can be framed as assigning numbers greedily
DP state should capture the last assigned number and its parity
swapping arrays to ensure smaller length for DP table optimizes space
